sentences: Jasmina "Mina" Kostić (Serbian Cyrillic: Јасмина "Мина" Костић; born Minira Jašari, Serbian Cyrillic: Минира Јашари, on 5 May 1975) is a Serbian turbo-folk singer.
Mina Kostić was born as Minira Jašari in the Ledine neighbourhood of Belgrade, into a Romani family of 10 children.
She was adopted at 5 years of age by Evdokija "Duda" Ivanović.
Her former partner is singer Igor Kostić, whom she dated from December 2007 until shortly after becoming parents to a daughter, Anastasija (born February 2009).
